attributes.action: Change protocol to allow an MP to call another a liar in the House if it is true
attributes.additional_details: The convention of using only euphemisms, terminological inexactitude etc, when reasonably describing another MP a liar, brings Parliament into disrepute/makes it into a laughing stock
attributes.background: Require the Speaker to desist from taking punitive action against an MP who accuses another of being a liar unless clearly done as mere abuse

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593112
